lead_paragraph: Fueled by the rich interior world of her surreal and childlike imagination, the Italian designer has come to reshape the creative boundaries of design.

headline.main: Delfina Delettrez Fendi’s Whimsical Jewelry — and Many Inspirations

snippet: Fueled by the rich interior world of her surreal and childlike imagination, the Italian designer has come to reshape the creative boundaries of design.
abstract: Italian jewelry designer Delfina Delettrez Fendi is drawing on her rich, childlike imagination to expand creative boundaries of design.
